settings.content: How to add products to the front page

go to collections add go to frontpage collection add/remove items from the collection once the item is added to the collection, you also need to edit the alt tag for the image for the item go to the new item's page click "alt" on the image you want to be the large image write the alternate text to the image, adding "lifestyle" at the end of the description

go to the page of the item that you want to be displayed in the url take the last segment ... http://shop.surfthegreats.org/products/flatblues in this case it will be flatblues go to the related item's page in the admin pannel add flatblues as a tag
